Validation is when you use the terminal to verify tickets that may be winners.
You can use the Online Validation and Instant Validation buttons here to perform validations for Draw Game and Instant tickets.
Draw Game tickets and Instant tickets are read using the Barcode Scanner.
Let's start with validating a Draw Game ticket.
I'll touch Online Validation
and scan the ticket barcode using the scanner.
If needed, you could also manually enter the ticket serial number using the numeric keypad.
When a ticket can be validated and is for a prize amount of $20 to $500, a Confirmation screen will display the amount asking if you are able to pay the prize.
The reason for this screen is so that you can ensure you have the money on hand to pay that prize amount to the player.
If you are able to pay the player, touch Yes to validate the ticket and pay the player.
If the player declines the method of payment, touch No and return the ticket to the player.
I'll touch Yes.

and am returned to the Online Validation screen where I could validate another ticket if needed. I don't need to, so I'll touch Home

Now, let's look at validating an Instant ticket.
For Instant tickets, touch Instant Validation.
Here you can use the Barcode Scanner
or you could manually enter the Ticket Number, Serial Number and Security Number and touch Send.
Never insert Instant tickets into the Reader at the top of the terminal as it will damage the Reader lens!
I'll scan the barcode tag using the Barcode Scanner
and an Instant Validation confirmation screen displays.
I'll touch OK to pay the prize
